content: These include noncash items totaling $8.1 million or $0.41 per diluted share, including a noncash loss of 39 -- $3.9 million or $0.20 per diluted share on a pretax basis, for the foreign exchange impact of lease liabilities and forward contracts and cash items totaling $1.5 million or $0.08 per diluted share, primarily transitory costs related to supply chain disruptions. EBITDA for the prior year fiscal '22 6-month period was $21.7 million, EBITDA was impacted by $13.4 million of noncash items as well as $9.3 million in cash items, primarily due to transitory cost pressures related to supply chain disruptions.
